title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Coaxing people out of a rut is one of your specialties today. Coworkers or family members are unusually prone to tunnel vision, especially if circumstances demand the slightest deviation from routine. Your quick wit and naturally free-spirited ways can serve as a neat reminder that attitude is a choice. Choosing optimism encourages others to follow suit. Even a small elevation in the collective mood is an improvement for the better, and that change can start with you. Spontaneity is the best kind of adventure. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
